title: The Table attribute
description: We will introduce a brand new attribute type called `Table`. It will be very helpful for your multi-dimensional data needs. Indeed, it will be perfect to handle information such as product composition, dimensions, packaging or even nutrition information. You will be able to choose from different pre-crafted templates and then, select a type for all your table columns (simple select, number, text or boolean).

title: Even more powerful tailored exports
description: We will continue to deliver new features to enhance our tailored exports: product model support, CSV file format, ability to replace simple select values, and to clean the HTML tags of your text areas.
